<p>You might recall Rabbit's recent article on furries who pre-date the furry fandom —the <a title="Paleofurs— The Anthropomorphic Fans of the Past" href="http://www.adjectivespecies.com/2014/02/21/paleofurs-the-anthropomorphic-fans-of-the-past/">Paleofurs</a>.</p>
<p>He is continuing to hunt for examples of paleofurs. Help him out over at his dedicated Tumblr:<a href="http://paleofurs.tumblr.com/"> paleofurs.tumblr.com</a>.</p>
